select m.BRH_ID,m.SHARE_STANDARD_TOTAL,m.SINGLE_SHARE_MONEY,m.SHARE_THRESHOLD,n.BRH_NAME,m.SHARE_RULEID,m.SHARE_RULENAME,m.FREERATIO,case m.SHARETYPE when '0' then '固定金额' else '比例(%)' end as SHARETYPE,m.MCHT_SHAREVAL,m.ORGSHAREVAL_FIRST,m.ORGSHAREVAL_SECOND,m.ORGSHAREVAL_THREE,case m.SHARE_RULESTATUS when '0' then '停止' else '启用' end as SHARE_RULESTATUS from TBL_ALIPAY_SHARE_PARAM m,TBL_BRH_INFO n where m.BRH_ID = n.BRH_ID
